attributes.action: Identify and Restrict drivers convicted for dangerous driving and serious speeding with an R plate
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The petition is to ensure that safe motorists and the police can clearly identify drivers on the road who have been convicted of serious traffic offences. Also drivers should be restricted to a maximim 50mph speed limit. By forcing conviced drivers to diplay a red 'R' Restricted plate police and other drivers can be alerted to the higher risk.
